item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Talhah Peerbhai and I’m really passionate about Computers and Electronic systems. This site is just a sort of side project for me to blog about some of my experiences and to improve my writing skills. I hope you enjoy my posts and find something which interests you. Comments have not been implemented yet so feel free to reach out to me with the information below. Contact me via: Email: hello@talhah.
